content: this quick crochet pattern will help you create moon and star appliqués the appliqués can be sewn onto almost any of your crochet creations to make them look pretty the appliqué moon measures 5 5cm x 3 5cm and the stars measure 3 5cm dk weight 3 yarn i used king cole pricewise dk - yellow - 6m / 7yd - blue - 8m / 9yd supplies you will need crochet hook 4mm tapestry needle dk yarn scissors recommend skill level is beginner the pattern is written in usa terminology you will need to know basic crochet stitches single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet you will also need to know how to work into a magic_ring the pattern is 3 pages long and includes gauge instructions and photos a free version of this pattern is available on https //hookfully com/free-moon-star-appliques-crochet-patterns/
